full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## EZ899-240650: Muncho Lake and Sikanni Hill Rockfall Mitigation

### Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking contractors to perform rockfall mitigation work along the Alaska Highway between km 700 and km 704 (Muncho Lake) and km 255 and km 256 (Sikanni Hill).

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Installation of approximately 12,240 m2 of rockfall attenuation mesh, including necessary anchors
* Scaling of approximately 500 m2 of rock face between km 700+000 and km 700+450
* Scaling of rock cut between km 701+000 and km 702+250 to ensure worker safety
* Removal and disposal of all materials generated during scaling
* Installation of up to approximately 1,350 m2 of rockfall attenuation mesh as needed due to removal during scaling or damage to existing mesh

### Tender Requirements

* Competitive - selective tendering
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada, British Columbia
* Regions of Delivery: Canada, British Columbia
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2024

### Contract Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Simon Leung (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17120882?extsite=MTcxMjA4ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Status
